author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Adam is finally ready to tackle one of his dream prop builds: a replica of the sword of Green Destiny from his favorite wuxia film Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon! A build ten years in the making, Adam breaks down the constituent parts of the build--blade, handle, pommel, and guard--to explain the progress he's made with each and the challenges to complete them. And the thing that kicked off this build: Adam finding a perfect analogue for the jade guard in a material called G-10. Let's head to the pantograph mill!

Shot by Adam Savage and edited by Joey Fameli
Music by Jinglepunks
